summary: Implements the GitPython submodule subsystem, offering classes to represent individual submodules, a virtual root aggregating all submodules in a repository, and utilities for parsing and synchronizing submodule configuration. Supports operations such as init, sync, update, clone, and provides progress reporting mechanisms for bulk actions.
business_intent: Enable applications using GitPython to programmatically manage Git submodules—creating, configuring, updating, and traversing them—while keeping configuration files in sync and delivering real-time progress feedback.
